description: George Nkencho was shot by garda¨ª in Dublin after reports of a man armed with a knife at a shop.
title: George Nkencho: Witnesses sought after man shot by police
title_page: George Nkencho: Witnesses sought after man shot by police - BBC News
maintext: In a tweet, he said there were three "important" questions: "What attempts to de-escalate and disarm were made? Who took decision to shoot and why? Did the fact that he was a black man affect the decisions the garda¨ª made?"
